players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie's death is a huge blow. We need to be careful and analyze everyone's behavior. Bob, why did you remain silent?"
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Bob last night and he's the detective. Why would you frame me, Diana?"
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her. She is mafia. Bob, trust me and vote Alice out."
